languages.text: "Ты... лучше Теодоры. Не прими за комплимент. Это очень плохое качество для Вольного Торговца".
"You... are a better person than Theodora was. Do not take this as a compliment — it is an extremely detrimental quality for a Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Ты... лучше Теодоры. Не прими за комплимент. Это очень плохое качество для Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "You... are a better person than Theodora was. Do not take this as a compliment — it is an extremely detrimental quality for a Rogue Trader."
"You... are a better person than Theodora was. Do not take this as a compliment — it is an extremely detrimental quality for a Rogue Trader."

languages.text: «Eres... mejor persona de lo que fue Theodora. No te lo tomes como un cumplido; es una facultad extremadamente perjudicial para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "You... are a better person than Theodora was. Do not take this as a compliment — it is an extremely detrimental quality for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Eres... mejor persona de lo que fue Theodora. No te lo tomes como un cumplido; es una facultad extremadamente perjudicial para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: “你……你比西奥多拉更加善良。不要以为这是在夸赞你，对行商浪人而言，善良是一种极其有害的特质。”
languages.original_text: "You... are a better person than Theodora was. Do not take this as a compliment — it is an extremely detrimental quality for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “你……你比西奥多拉更加善良。不要以为这是在夸赞你，对行商浪人而言，善良是一种极其有害的特质。”

languages.text: 「あなたはシオドーラよりも偉大な人物だ。これは褒め言葉として受け取らないでほしいのだが―ローグトレーダーにとって非常に有害な資質だ」
languages.original_text: "You... are a better person than Theodora was. Do not take this as a compliment — it is an extremely detrimental quality for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはシオドーラよりも偉大な人物だ。これは褒め言葉として受け取らないでほしいのだが―ローグトレーダーにとって非常に有害な資質だ」

languages.text: "Ihr ... seid besser als Theodora. Das war allerdings kein Kompliment ... für {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} ist das nämlich ausgesprochen abträglich."
languages.original_text: "You... are a better person than Theodora was. Do not take this as a compliment — it is an extremely detrimental quality for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ... seid besser als Theodora. Das war allerdings kein Kompliment ... für {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} ist das nämlich ausgesprochen abträglich."

languages.text: « Vous... vous avez meilleur fond que votre prédécesseure. Et ce n'est pas un compliment, bien au contraire ; pour {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, c'est une qualité des plus préjudiciables. »
languages.original_text: "You... are a better person than Theodora was. Do not take this as a compliment — it is an extremely detrimental quality for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Vous... vous avez meilleur fond que votre prédécesseure. Et ce n'est pas un compliment, bien au contraire ; pour {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, c'est une qualité des plus préjudiciables. »

languages.text: "Sen... Theodora'dan daha iyi bir insansın. İltifat ediyorum sanma... Bu, bir Hür Tacir için oldukça kötü bir niteliktir."
languages.original_text: "You... are a better person than Theodora was. Do not take this as a compliment — it is an extremely detrimental quality for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Sen... Theodora'dan daha iyi bir insansın. İltifat ediyorum sanma... Bu, bir Hür Tacir için oldukça kötü bir niteliktir."
